alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 12:58AM CDT until July 14 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Cimarron County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 1257 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Texline, or 8 miles east of Clayton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Texline, Ware and Felt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
